sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Stake from './stake'; import Unstake from './Unstake'; export default function CreatePool2() { const [activeStep, setActivestep] = useState('Add or create pool'); const [stakeactive, setStakeactive] = useState('stake'); function PoolCreate() { return ( <>
Token Contract*
Contract Address of token/coin*
Value of 1 NFT in token/coin*
APY*
Performance Fee(%)*
Early Stake Period(Days)*
Early Unstake Penalty(%)*
Lock*
{ activeStep=="Add or create pool" ? null : }
) } function PoolDetails(){ return ( <>
Token Contract*
Contract Address of token/coin*
Value of 1 NFT in token/coin*
APY*
Performance Fee(%)*
Early Stake Period(Days)*
Early Unstake Penalty(%)*
Lock*
{ activeStep=="Add or create pool" ? null : }
) } function ViewPool() { return ( <>
{ stakeactive == 'stake' ? : }
{ activeStep=="Add or create pool" ? null : }
) } return ( <>
{ activeStep == "Add or create pool" ? PoolCreate() : activeStep == "pool details" ? PoolDetails() : activeStep == "View Pool" ? ViewPool() : null }
) }
